participant_1.name: Eli
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, always eager to learn about the world around him.
participant_1.background: i was born with my heart outside my body. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i'm a boy.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and cheerful, she loves nature and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i just broke up with my boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i have a pet fish.

content.text: Hey! Are you a boy? Because I am.
